1️⃣ POTATO CROQUETTES🧀 // full recipe ↓

Okay this might be my new fav way to make potatoes and you’ll probably feel the same way after you try them, cause you can’t go wrong with fried potatoes & cheese😮‍💨🫶

INGREDIENTS:
- 5 medium potatoes
- Garlic powder, salt & pepper to taste

- Vegan mozzarella cheese

- 2 cups blended cornflakes / panko breadcrumbs (gf)

- ½ cup flour (AP / gf)
- ¼ cup cornstarch
- Paprika, garlic powder, salt & pepper to taste
- ½ cup plant based milk (add more if too thick)

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Peel, dice and cook potatoes in boiling water for 10-15 minutes until fork tender.
2. Combine flour, cornstarch, spices and milk in a bowl and prepare a second bowl with blended gf cornflakes or panko breadcrumbs.
3. Mash potatoes and season with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Scoop the mixture, flatten it out and place a cube / shreds of vegan mozzarella cheese in the center. Cover a layer of the mashed potatoes and roll into a ball. Repeat until you’ve used all the mashed potatoes.
4. Dip each bin the wet batter and coat with breadcrumbs.
5. Heat neutral oil and deep fry each piece until golden brown. Serve with your favorite sauce & ENJOY!
